Texto: 
positive lab studies for cmv.
developmental delay
supportive
• cerebral atrophy with large ventricles and sulci.
• multiple brain calcifications on ct scan.
• atophic white matter
• abnormal wm signal intensity, best seen on flair and t2 imaging
prenatal (intrauterine) cytomegalovirus (cmv) infection
• other torch infections
• metabolic diseases.
3 mo baby girl  born premature new born with know congenital cmv. had ct scan of brain at 2 weeks of age. presents now,  at three months, with seizures.
